name: sk8away
description:
sk8away is a small arcade skating experience built around procedurally generated, looping stages. test your skills in the arcade mode by landing rad combos and completing objectives to increase your score. or just skate away your worries in the game's endless mode. originally created for black and white jam #8.

  • arcade mode stacked with objectives to complete
  • endless mode for chilling and practicing your skillz
  • proc-gen stages - play a different stage every run
  • use ramps, rails and halfpipes to build your combos
  • fill your radness meter and pull off gnarly super tricks
  • multiple control options + gamepad support
  • chill lo-fi monocrhrome sk8ing vibes

---------------------------------------------------------------

Credits:

music by VOiD1Gaming

sfx by Kenney

tile and background art derived from works by surt

programming + design + art by cosmiccrystal
